author: Staff Reporter
text:
A motorcycle rally to stress the importance of voting was taken out here on Thursday as part of a slew of voter awareness initiatives being carried out by the district administration.

Collector and Election Officer K. Veera Raghava Rao participated in the rally which commenced from Mappillai Vinayagar Theatre in Kalavasal, coming under Madurai Central Assembly constituency, and ended near Fatima College.
title: Motorcycle rally
